data.comment: Today's referee, Craig Pawson, has blown to start the match.
Free kick Tottenham.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Tottenham.
Throw-in Tottenham.
In the minute 5, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Wesley Fofana (Leicester) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Tottenham have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Tottenham.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Leicester just outside Tottenham's area.
In the minute 14, Leicester push forward at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium and Jamie Vardy gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tottenham defence.
Craig Pawson awards Leicester a goal kick.
Leicester to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
In the minute 17, In London Leicester attack through James Maddison. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Throw-in high up the field for Leicester in London.
In the minute 19, In London, Harvey Barnes of Leicester is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
Leicester's Jamie Vardy gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tottenham defender.
In the minute 21, Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 24, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Throw-in Tottenham.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Leicester awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Craig Pawson signals a Leicester throw-in in Tottenham's half.
In the minute 27, Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Leicester in the half of Tottenham.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 32, Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Marc Albrighton for Leicester has been booked by Craig Pawson and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Leicester.
Harry Kane of Tottenham smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Leicester.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Leicester.
In the minute 37, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Harvey Barnes.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leicester's Harvey Barnes is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Important block from the Leicester defence as Giovani Lo Celso fires in a strike for Tottenham.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
In the minute 41, Harry Kane's header is off-target for Tottenham.
Goal kick for Leicester at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 42, Tottenham attack but Harry Kane's header doesn't find the target.
In London, Marc Albrighton of Leicester is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Leicester drives forward and James Maddison gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, Harry Kane (Tottenham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Tottenham are whistled for offside.
In the minute 45, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Leicester.
Leicester have been awarded a penalty in London...
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in London.
Goal! Jamie Vardy gives Leicester the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
Craig Pawson has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leicester push forward at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium and Marc Albrighton gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tottenham defence.
James Maddison for Leicester drives towards goal at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Jose Mourinho is making the team's first substitution at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium with Gareth Bale replacing Tanguy Ndombele.
In the minute 49, Craig Pawson blows against Leicester's James Maddison for offside.
Lucas Moura is replacing Giovani Lo Celso for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Tottenham.
In the minute 51, Tottenham have a dangerous throw-in.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Craig Pawson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 55, Leicester have a goal kick.
Craig Pawson signals a Leicester throw-in in Tottenham's half.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
In the minute 57, James Maddison for Leicester is whistled offside.
Toby Alderweireld scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 0-2 at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Daniel Amartey is replacing Timothy Castagne for the away team.
In the minute 62, Tottenham's Harry Kane gets in a shot on goal at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
Harry Winks is on a sub for Serge Aurier for Tottenham.
Tottenham's Harry Kane is on target but unsuccessful.
Leicester to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
In the minute 68, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leicester's James Maddison breaks free at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Tottenham pushes forward through Heung Min Son, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 71, Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tottenham close to the penalty box.
Onyinye Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 73, Tottenham's Gareth Bale gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Sergio Reguilon for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 75, Throw-in Tottenham.
Free kick Tottenham.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Leicester at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 79, Tottenham's Eric Dier has been booked in London.
Leicester surge into the attack at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium but Wesley Fofanaâ€™s header is off-target.
Craig Pawson awards Tottenham a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
At Tottenham Hotspur Stadium, Harry Winks has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Important block from the Tottenham defence as Jamie Vardy fires in a strike for Leicester.
Leicester's James Maddison gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tottenham defender.
Jamie Vardy gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leicester.
In the minute 83, Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leicester make their second substitution with Dennis Praet replacing Harvey Barnes.
In the minute 85, Leicester are pushing forward but Youri Tielemans's finish is wide of the goal.
Tottenham have a goal kick.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
The away team replace Jamie Vardy with Kelechi Iheanacho.
Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Leicester close to the penalty box.
Leicester's James Maddison is whistled for offside at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Craig Pawson signals a Tottenham throw-in in Leicester's half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Leicester.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
In London Leicester's Kelechi Iheanacho is caught offside.
Leicester needs to be cautious. Tottenham have an attacking throw-in.
Can Tottenham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leicester's half?
Harry Kane of Tottenham gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Leicester at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
